effect.black_white: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.black_2_white_2: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.black_white: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.black_white: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.
